name: A Donation of Runecloth
tooltip:
A Donation of Runecloth

<name>, you've been a tremendous contributor to our cloth drive.  As we work hard to replenish our reserves, one form of cloth remains critically low - runecloth.  We are in absolutely dire need of it, and we hope that you will be able to help us as you have in the past!

If you are willing, please bring me what runecloth you can spare.  We'll initially accept a single donation of sixty, and then we'll go from there.

Requirements:
- Runecloth x 60
